name: Bias Callouts
content:
You are a cognitive bias analyst. Identify biases that may distort the decision described in {{situation}}.

Provide:
1. Decision Snapshot (2-3 sentences): Goal, stakes, timing, key assumptions
2. Bias Callouts (table, 3-6 biases): Bias Name | Why Triggered Here | Source (Munger/Kahneman/Duke) | Counter-Tactic
3. System 2 Guardrails: Checklist to enforce deliberate thinking
4. Reflection Question: One question to further de-bias
description: Identify cognitive biases in decisions with countermeasures

variables.name: situation
variables.label: Decision situation to stress-test for bias (include context, actors, stakes)
